name: Sector.
description:
Sector. is an endless arcade game brought to you by the developer of Torus. – Brandon Kynoch, a talented 17-year-old developer.

Swipe to progress – intuitive gameplay, beautiful design, rich audio and simple controls. Sector. provides the ultimate casual gaming experience.

You have one simple objective – score as high as you can. Compete with players around the world and make your way to the top of the leaderboard. How far can you go?
